SELECT s.userId,t.storeId,s.mobilePhone,sv.name name,t.storeName,t.userName,DATE_FORMAT(t.addTime,"%Y-%m-%d") addTime,t.phone,s.locked,t.licenseId FROM sys_user s LEFT JOIN t_store t ON s.userId=t.userId LEFT JOIN sys_supervisor sv on sv.supervisorNum=t.supervisorId WHERE 1=1 AND s.type='B'
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND s.locked = #{relationMap.status}
AND ( s.mobilePhone LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.name}),'%') OR t.storeName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.name}),'%') )
ORDER BY addTime desc
SELECT s.userId,s.mobilePhone,t.storeName,t.userName,t.phone,s.locked,t.licenseId FROM sys_user s LEFT JOIN t_store t ON s.userId=t.userId WHERE t.storeId=#{storeId}

SELECT s.userId,s.storeName,s.userName,s.idCard,s.phone,s.area,s.address,s.licenseId, c.frontPic frontPic,c.backPic backPic,s.licensePic,s.frontStorePic,s.innerStorePic, b.bankType,b.accountType,b.userName bankUserName,b.cardNumber, b.idType,b.idCard cIdCard,b.remark FROM t_store s LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_bankCard WHERE bankType=0 AND `status`=1) b ON s.userId=b.userId LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_user_cert WHERE `status`=1) c ON s.userId=c.userId WHERE s.storeId=#{storeId}
SELECT banId,userId,item,type,money/100 money,status,addTime,remain/100 as remain FROM t_balance WHERE 1=1 AND userId=#{relationMap.userId} ORDER BY addTime desc
